DOC.brief_summary: This study examine safety profile SGN-35 alone combination gemcitabine . The study test increase dos SGN-35 give weekly small group patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Dose Escalation Study SGN-35 Alone Combination With Gemcitabine CD30-Positive Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm CD30positive hematologic malignancy . Patients HL must fail systemic chemotherapy . Patients CD30positive malignancy ( include ALCL ) must beyond first remission refractory front line chemotherapy . Patients must measurable disease least 1.5 cm document radiographic technique . Current diagnosis primary cutaneous ALCL ( systemic ALCL eligible ) . History allogeneic stem cell transplant . Patients previous treatment antiCD30 antibody .
